name: Photography porfolio
description: Picked up the trade of high-quality photography.
Specializing in outdoors and landscape photos, and people in outdoor settings.
Love capturing beautiful moments and scenes.
jasoncurtisphotography.com

name: Climb Planner
description: Built a tool to help mountain climbers prepare for backcountry trips.
Interfaced with commonly-used websites/APIs to bring helpful data close to hand.
Enjoyed using a React and ES2015 transpiled stack and service-oriented architecture.
Try it!

name: Aerial photography
description: Learned aerial photography and videography during adventures in New Zealand.
Single-person and team operation of the 3DR Solo quadcopter.
Watch Video

name: Hakai Kayaking
description: Performed a wet-launch in the Hakai Wilderness Area in British Columbia and spent 11 days kayaking in the wilderness with three friends.
Exercised advanced kayaking and wilderness techniques.
Had the time of our lives.

name: Robotic Sailboat
description: Helped form and manage undergraduate team to design & build a robotic sailboat in 1 academic year.
Competed in the World Robotic Sailing Competition in Vancouver, taking second place.
Managed 6-member coding team to create a successful and highly tunable codebase.
Robot capable of autonomously setting sails and rudder to accomplish missions, programmable on-the-fly through an offboard GUI.
See Project Website

name: Magnetic knife rack
description: Built a magnetic knife rack for home use.
Routing, woodworking and craftsmanship
Used sander, router and other hand tools.

name: Parkour
description: Founded a parkour group at Olin College.
Exploring fluid movement across obstacles in an urban environment
Dive rolls
~8ft. horizontal wall runs (pictured)
~10ft. vertical wall climbs
Recorded video
The world is a playground!

name: FPGA Multiphonic Synthesizer
description: Co-created a polyphonic music synthesizer using an FPGA development board.
Wrote a multi-level modular architecture in Verilog
Live interface with switches and de-bounced buttons
Up to four simultaneous tones, each separately modulated in the key of C and programmable for an 8-beat measure

name: Ultrasonic Anemometer
description: Low-cost wind speed measurement without moving parts
Commercial version costs ~$1300, ours cost $130
Analog and digital signal processing
Wind-tunnel tested for verification & calibration

name: Antonymizer
description: Wrote a Python web application to change the meaning of input text
Used natural language processing and web APIs to replace certain words with appropriate antonyms

name: Off In Singapore Blog
description: Managed a blog with two friends during study away adventures in Singapore
Photographer
Web Styling and Upkeep
Adventures in Foreign Lands
See Project Website

name: Travelling Salesman Solver
description: Tasked with finding the solution to a Travelling Salesman problem as a final class project.
Instead of writing just one algorithm, wrote three: a genetic algorithm, a complete search, and a greedy algorithm.
Download Code Example (requires a Python interpreter)

name: Sustainable Smartroom
description: Designed and built a room automation retrofit.
Included wirelessly-networked, automatically controlled "smart" fan and lights with the aim of reducing power consumption.
Exercised network design, PIC & Xbee programming in C and circuit design.
Visit Project Website

name: Interactive Walking Route Optimizer
description: Wrote a program that provides optimal walking routes from place to place at Olin College.
Uses an underlying graph model of Olin and provides textual and visual representations of routes.
Dynamically recalculates routes to meet the user's preference of whether the path should be indoors or outdoors.

name: Magnetic Levitation Modelling
description: Designed a science-museum type digital exhibit to explain the basics of magnetic levitation and its applications in high-speed transport and efficient systems.
Created an interactive MATLAB simulation of a linear induction motor.
Download Linear Motor Code (requires MATLAB)
View Poster
